categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Holt was a Star Destroyer captain in the Imperial Navy and commanded a mission to recover Celeste Morne in 0 ABY. After both Morne and a Rebel task force which included Luke Skywalker, Han Solo and Leia Organa escaped the moon, Holt was transformed into a rakghoul by Morne through the Muur Talisman.
